ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are going to freeport at that level you will be ok, just watch out for the giants and griffs. The first 8-10 times I ran there and from i took the path
ygData.messageBody:
If you are going to freeport at that level you will be ok,
just watch out for the giants and griffs.

The first 8-10 times I ran there and from i took the path through high hold.
And that was stupid, so very very stupid.
Go through runnyeye, its a cake. just make all lefts goin towards freeport
and you will be in rivervale in 20 sec,

eheh

vashi

>From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
>
>You know the spell : Spirite of Wolf, well... I think this ring eather
>gives
>you the spell pernamently or add alot of agl. I don't really know couse
>some og my guild members are getting me a Shiny Brass Shield and 2 SOW
>rings
>and I'm planning a trip to freeport to pick it up, I'm lvl 12 almost lvl 13
>so It's going to be a tough trip but I think I might be able to do it if I
>run stieght there with another high lvl character. So i should be
>expecting
>them around this friday ALSO when i hit freeport I'm going to start with my
>smithing skill couse Qeynos sucks for smithing and I need banded armor
>BADLY!!
>
>Dealan <The Light of Norrath> For the glory of Karana (The Rainkeeper). -
>Karana Server
>
>----Original Message Follows----
>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
>Date: Wed, 26 May 1999 10:28:11 +0900
>
>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>What is an SOW ring? I have heard of Journeyman Boots, but not SOW ring.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 11:41 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
> >
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > A SOW ring and bloodstained mantle give you wolf speed? where can I get
> > these items?
> >
> > >>> "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...> 5.24.99 9:19:33 PM >>>
> > From: "Dean Boyle" <gino_14@...>
> >
> > Hail! I'm a human warrior (male) and what I've found to be good is a
> > spiked
> > collor. it's add's AC+3 and STG+3. I have 95stg and with that i have 98.
> > It's help alot! Also if you can get one SOW ring (adds lots to AGL) and
> > one
> > bloodsained mantle you'll be set and run fast as a wolf. I've also
>found
> > that onyx earrings add +2 to AGL witch helps out alot! There about 1pp
> > each
> > and Gnol Commanders tend to drop them.
> >
> >
> > ----Original Message Follows----
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > To: "'warriors_eq@onelist.com'" <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor
> > Date: Mon, 24 May 1999 10:33:03 +0900
> >
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > BAH! 130! try being a warrior with 75 str!
> >
> > Flesh band rings increase str by 2 and bloodstained mantle increase it
>by
> > 4.
> > Only thing I know off.
> >
> > How to make money, hmm patience. Im level 21 now and the mobs I fight
> > generally drop either platinum as loot or expensive items I can sell.
> >
> > By level 12 I had made about 80pp from trading and then another 100 by
> > level
> > 16 when I bought my banded. I made the money from player trading
>(selling
> > mino axes and dervish rings in qeynos and halas etc etc). I found this
>to
> > be tedious and no longer need to do that.
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:30 PM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor
> > >
> > > From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
> > >
> > > I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank. Although I have a fine steel
> > long
> > > sword, I can't seem to get enough loot to buy any decent armor. I am
> > in
> > > east commons now headed back to Halas and I only have 10 plat in the
> > bank.
> > >
> > > Help! Where should I be hunting to get loot!
> > >
> > > p.s. On top of that, I know once I get decent armor it will weigh me
> > down.
> > >
> > > What is avalible at higher ranks to increase my strength (currently a
> > > paltry
> > > 130)?
